quotes.message: There will be no redemption because the men who run this place do not want redemption. They want to be as near to hell as they can.
quotes.name: Colson Whitehead

quotes.message: Between the radiant white of a clear conscience and the coal black of a conscience sullied by sin lie many shades of gray--where most of us live our lives. Not perfect but not beyond redemption.
quotes.name: Sherry L. Hoppe

quotes.message: The idea of redemption is always good news, even if it means sacrifice or some difficult times.
quotes.name: Patti Smith

quotes.message: Redemption is possible, and it is the measure of a civilized society.
quotes.name: Greg Boyle

quotes.message: Redemption is not perfection. The redeemed must realize their imperfections.
quotes.name: John Piper

quotes.message: Seeking to forget makes exile all the longer; the secret of redemption lies in remembrance.
quotes.name: Richard von Weizsaecker

quotes.message: The mark of our society as civilized will come when we embrace confidence in the power of redemption.
quotes.name: Greg Boyle

quotes.message: Hell is yourself and the only redemption is when a person puts himself aside to feel deeply for another person.
quotes.name: Tennessee Williams

quotes.message: Language is conceived in sin and science is its redemption.
quotes.name: Willard Van Orman Quine

quotes.message: Redemption sounds like a jubilee. Like a second line, if you will.
quotes.name: Dawn Richard

quotes.message: The best way to use the gold of the Redeemer is for the redemption of those in peril.
quotes.name: Saint Ambrose

quotes.message: Redemption isn't giving a bank robber a job as a teller.
quotes.name: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.message: [No] matter what a waste one has made of one's life, it is ever possible to find some path to redemption, however partial.
quotes.name: Charles Frazier

quotes.message: We seek redemption, yet, we don't seek forgiveness.
quotes.name: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.message: To be in Christ -- that is redemption; but for Christ to be in you -- that is sanctification!
quotes.name: Major W. Ian Thomas

quotes.message: Life is complex. You don't have any person who is nice from the beginning until the end. You don't always have the notion of redemption. The bad people don't always pay.
quotes.name: Marjane Satrapi

quotes.message: When you find your definitions in God, you find the very purpose for which you were created. Put your hand into God's hand, know His absolutes, demonstrate His love, present His truth, and the message of redemption and transformation will take hold.
quotes.name: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.message: At the cross God wrapped his heart in flesh and blood and let it be nailed to the cross for our redemption.
quotes.name: E. Stanley Jones

quotes.message: People find meaning and redemption in the most unusual human connections.
quotes.name: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.message: The gospel comprises indeed, and unfolds, the whole mystery of man's redemption, as far forth as it is necessary to be known for our salvation.
quotes.name: Robert Boyle

quotes.message: You have to be a little contrite to get redemption.
quotes.name: Steve Madden

quotes.message: The Christian notion of the possibility of redemption is incomprehensible to the computer.
quotes.name: Vance Packard

quotes.message: In all God's plans for human redemption, He proposes that men pray. The men are to pray in every place, in the church, in the closet, in the home, on sacred days and on secular days.
quotes.name: Edward Mckendree Bounds
